name: Waze (testing version)
description:
Oh, all the Waze you can go!

That's right fella's, another roguelike.

Waze is a RogueLike game where you play as a blob bunny who wanders through an infinite dungeon. But whenever you leave a room, it changes..

You start off with a sword, but if you want to gain some money or advancements, you might have to drop some stuff. So choose wisely.

Donations aren't required, but it's greatly appreciated! (or if you just like the soundtrack, that's cool too.)

How to play:

You travel through randomly generated caves containing different rooms, loot, and monsters. As stated above, you can only carry one item at a time. But once you reach the end room, all the items outside of the end room will be deleted.

You start in a room where you can get used to the game's controls. (You can press S to skip it)

Arrow keys = Move around

Z = Pick up/Enter stairs/Use

X = Use an Item

C = Drop

You must have at least a Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Computer to run this game.

Look, if you can run Undertale, you can run Waze
